That tally doesn’t include 9,185 student workers. The university is “reducing and reorganizing its workforce due to cutbacks in funding and necessary budget reductions,” wrote Melissa Gerdes-Leonard, associate vice president of client services with USC’s human resources department, in an Oct. 27 letter filed with the state’s Employment Development Department. Also see: USC won’t sign Trump compact on federal funding The latest round of layoffs are happening at USC’s University Park, a leafy 229-acre main campus for the institution’s academic schools and residential buildings near Exposition Park in downtown Los Angeles. She was preceded in death by her parents and her older sister, Helga Torres. Known for her generosity, kindness, and beautiful spirit, Elaine touched the hearts of all who knew her. Her gentle presence, loving nature, and unwavering support for her family and friends made her a precious gift to them. She will be deeply missed, and her memor', 'Janet Marie Flores Birth: 1931 Death: 2025 Janet Marie Flores passed away peacefully on November 21, 2025 at the age of 94 surrounded by the love of her family. Jan was born on October 31, 1931 in San Francisco to loving parents Alice Detour and Joseph Hettrick. Jan was a loving mother, grandmother and great grandmother who found her greatest joy in her family. She had a way of making people feel welcomed. She was kind, big hearted, extremely gracious and devoted to those she loved. Her presence will be deeply missed. Jan lived a long life traveling, playing golf, bunco with her friends and one of her greatest talents was to find a treasure at garage sales. In her final years she enjoyed playing penny slots at the casino. The last nine years Jan spent in the loving care of her daughter and son in law. A special thank you to her granddaughter Samantha for making her last days warm, comfortable and full of love. Jan survived by her daughter Tina Schilling (Michael), her grandchildren Michael (Marissa), Paul (Kacie), Samantha (Carlos), and her nine great grandchildren Jackson, Aubrey, Jordan, Mikey, Ellie, Luna, Ryder, Makayla and Stella. And her friends who will forever cherish her memory. Her family requests that gifts in lieu of flowers be made in Linda’s name to St. Jude Children’s Research Hospital. Representative_Docs: ['Asking Eric: I’m annoyed that friend, IRL, never comments or ‘likes’ my online posts Dear Eric: I have a friend I’ve known for four years. We all live in a 55+ community and have moved here from different areas of the country. We are a group of women who get together on a regular basis for outings. Over the past couple of months, I feel somewhat left out because of a couple of events I wasn’t included in. But what I’m trying to understand is why does she not “like” or comment on any of my Facebook posts when she’s all over everyone else’s with supportive and loving comments? Again, this is so silly, but I can’t help wondering why. When I look back at my posts, I noticed she has never acknowledged any of them, even for my birthday. We are still friends, we work with the same fundraising group, have dinner at each other’s house and get invited to the same events. This Facebook thing has got me confused and I don’t know what kind of friend she is so I’m getting uncomfortable around her. So now, what am I doing? Ignoring her posts, which makes me feel so stupid and juvenile. If I wasn’t part of this group, which I really like, I wouldn’t bother with her. Can you shed any light on her mindset? It’s really got me confused. – Friend Request Dear Friend: Even though social', 'Asking Eric: Can mom work through tension in son’s relationship with dad so they can celebrate special birthday? Dear Eric: My son is turning 40 on December 22. My husband and I are at a quandary as to how to celebrate him. There have been issues between my husband and him over things from his childhood. We did a special trip for his older brother when he turned 40 and would like to do something special for this son’s 40th as well. Our daughter-in-law has made special plans for him and we are not included. I understand that, but I need some ideas as to how to celebrate this extra special year without rocking the boat. I love my son with all my heart, as I do all my children, and want his 40th birthday to be memorable in a positive way. Any suggestions? – Mom Who Wants to Celebrate Dear Mom: The issues your son and your husband are having may be an obstacle, but they aren’t insurmountable. And the thing that can get them on the path to resolution is the same thing that can get you answers about how to celebrate your son: open communication. Representative_Docs: ['HNL Lab Medicine Brings Escape Room Fun to Hospital Education ALLENTOWN, Pa., Nov. 10, 2025 /PRNewswire/ -- HNL Lab Medicine is transforming hospital training by turning mandatory education into an adventure. Terms of Service and Privacy Policy. There is black, and then there is ultrablack. The shade defined as a black that reflects less than 0.5 percent of the light that hits it, is used on everything from telescopes to cameras. This uniquely dark color is not easy to produce and may appear less black when it is viewed at an angle. To find a better way to reproduce this cool color, a team at Cornell University looked to nature. Specifically, a bird called the magnificent riflebird. The result is the darkest known fabric ever created and it is detailed in a study recently published in the journal Nature Communications. The magnificent riflebird is a large songbird and member of the bird-of-paradise family found in New Guinea and Australia. Male riflebirds are almost completely black, with a green and blue metallic sheen on their belly, throat, and crown feathers. With the help of Mary M. Ferraro and Vanya Rohwer from the Cornell Lab of Ornithology, the team studied the riflebird’s black feathers. Students at Ashby High School are busy raising money and getting ready to pack their bags for a two-week learning experience in South Africa. ADVERTISEMENT When it is below zero, the main street in Ashby, Minnesota, is quiet. Fewer than 500 people call this Grant County town home, but lately the town is busy rallying around a group of high school students. In the basement of Peace Grue Lutheran in the middle of town, five high school students join veteran church quilters in tying quilts that the students will take on their trip to South Africa. "There is a reason the church ladies do this and not the guys," joked Kevin Fick, the girls\' weightlifting coach and organizer of the trip, of tying quilts the students will take with them as gifts. Five girls, along with Fick and four adult chaperones, will make the trip to Eastern Cape, South Africa, from Feb. 28 through March 10. Not as tourists, but to learn about conservation on another continent. "Not a lot of kids get to do this," said student Hadley Hokanson, student. They will work a sheep ranch, fish for sharks, harvest their own food, camp in the bushes and more. Representative_Docs: ['It’s official! Govinda’s son Yashvardhan Ahuja steps into Bollywood with HUNDRED HUNDRED is directed by Sajid Khan and marks an important milestone for Bollywood, as it launches Yashvardhan Ahuja in a leading role. Yashvardhan is the son of popular actor Govinda and Sunita Ahuja, and his debut has already generated buzz within the film industry. With this film, he steps into mainstream Hindi cinema, hoping to make a strong impression with a genre that demands intense performance and screen presence. Opposite him is Nitanshi Goel, the young actress who won praise for her performance in Laapataa Ladies. Known for her natural acting and expressive screen presence, Nitanshi’s pairing with Yashvardhan is being seen as a fresh and promising on-screen combination. Fans are eager to see the two actors together in a horror setting, which is different from their usual cinematic spaces. The film began its first shooting schedule at Filmcity, Mumbai, on the auspicious occasion of Basant Panchmi. The makers chose the festival day to kick off the project, hoping it would bring positivity and success to the film. The Filmcity schedule will focus on setting up the eerie atmosphere and introducing key characters in the story.
